JOSEPH CHUNG.

Morph Memorial
MORPH is a concept design for Art Center College of Design, focusing on three key points. Commemoration of those who contributed to cultivating emerging designers, providing multi-purpose outdoor area for the current students and visitors, and to showcase and promote sustainability of native plants in california.
